title: Test Issue: pango
body:
Running
```
spack install --test=root pango
```
results in
```
==> No patches needed for pango
==> pango: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> pango: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> pango: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4' 'check'

4 errors found in build log:
     924    # XPASS: 0
     925    # ERROR: 0
     926    ===================================================================
            =========
     927    See tests/test-suite.log
     928    Please report to http://bugzilla.gnome.org/enter_bug.cgi?product=pa
            ngo
     929    ===================================================================
            =========
  >> 930    make[3]: *** [test-suite.log] Error 1
     931    make[3]: Leaving directory `/tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-st
            age-pango-1.41.0-xu2khcgd6lbzuxgelveduk27ebjcle6k/spack-src/tests'
  >> 932    make[2]: *** [check-TESTS] Error 2
     933    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-st
            age-pango-1.41.0-xu2khcgd6lbzuxgelveduk27ebjcle6k/spack-src/tests'
  >> 934    make[1]: *** [check-am] Error 2
     935    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-st
            age-pango-1.41.0-xu2khcgd6lbzuxgelveduk27ebjcle6k/spack-src/tests'
  >> 936    make: *** [check-recursive] Error 1

See build log for details:
  /tmp/gitlab-runner/spack-stage/spack-stage-pango-1.41.0-xu2khcgd6lbzuxgelveduk27ebjcle6k/spack-build-out.txt
```
